name: Flippin' Hot Wieners
description:
This game is 50% silly game idea, and 50% technical demo for a real-time navier stokes based fire simulator. 

Eventually, I plan to make more complex and engaging games that feature this fire simulator, but in the mean time, I wanted to make a game project to see how the simulator integrates into full game projects. This little project is the result of that test!

Playing and beating it should only take a few minutes. If you decide to try it, I hope you have fun either way!
